content:
ColorChannelFlag Enum

Definition

Specifies individual channels in the CMYK (cyan, magenta, yellow, black) color space. This enumeration is used by the stem.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel* methods.

In this Article

public enum ColorChannelFlag
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ColorChannelFlag

Remarks

The values are flags, which can be combined by using the OR operator.

Fields

ColorChannelC

The cyan color channel.
ColorChannelK

The black color channel.
ColorChannelLast

The last selected channel should be used.
ColorChannelM

The magenta color channel.
ColorChannelY

The yellow color channel.
